Company Overview.Name: PDS Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: PDS Ltd is engaged in trading of garments, investment holding, design, development, marketing, sourcing and distribution of readymade garments of all kinds and other consumer products worldwide.
Company Overview.Market Position: Part of BSE SmallCap, BSE Allcap, BSE Consumer Discretionary

Other Insights.Pros: Company has delivered good profit growth of 26.9% CAGR over last 5 years. Company has been maintaining a healthy dividend payout of 22.2%.
Other Insights.Cons: Promoter holding has decreased over last quarter: -4.04%. Tax rate seems low.
Other Insights.Disclaimer: The pros and cons are machine generated. Pros / cons are based on a checklist to highlight important points. Please exercise caution and do your own analysis.
